00039 #ifndef RANDOMDEVIATE_H_
00040 #define RANDOMDEVIATE_H_
00041 
00043 
00047 class RandomDeviate
00048 {
00049 public:
00050         explicit RandomDeviate( const unsigned long arraySize = 100000 );
00051     virtual ~RandomDeviate( );
00052     virtual void FillArray( double* array, const unsigned long arraySize )=0;
00053     unsigned long NumbersGenerated( ) const;
00054     unsigned long NumbersProvided( ) const;
00055     double RandomDouble( );
00056   
00057 private:
00058      const unsigned long m_arraySize;
00059      double* m_randomNumber;
00060      unsigned long m_numbersGenerated;
00061      unsigned long m_nextRandomNumber;
00062 };     
00063 
00064 inline RandomDeviate::RandomDeviate( const unsigned long arraySize )
00065 : m_arraySize(arraySize), m_randomNumber(0), m_numbersGenerated(0), m_nextRandomNumber(arraySize)
00066 {
00067         m_randomNumber = new double[arraySize];
00068 }
00069 
00070 inline RandomDeviate::~RandomDeviate( )
00071 {
00072         if( m_randomNumber ) delete [] m_randomNumber;
00073 }
00074 
00075 inline double RandomDeviate::RandomDouble( )
00076 {
00077         if( m_nextRandomNumber >= m_arraySize  )
00078         {
00079                 m_nextRandomNumber = 0;
00080                 FillArray( m_randomNumber, m_arraySize );
00081                 m_numbersGenerated += m_arraySize;
00082         }
00083         return m_randomNumber[m_nextRandomNumber++];
00084 }
00085 
00086 inline unsigned long RandomDeviate::NumbersGenerated( ) const
00087 {
00088         return m_numbersGenerated;
00089 }
00090 
00091 inline unsigned long RandomDeviate::NumbersProvided( ) const
00092 {
00093         return ( m_numbersGenerated > 0 )? m_numbersGenerated - m_arraySize + m_nextRandomNumber : 0;
00094 }
00095 
00096 #endif // RANDOMDEVIATE_H_
